name: sprout
description: A monorepo for the Sprout application

scripts.dev: bun run dev:redis:up && bun run dev:database:up && bun run dev:api
scripts.dev:containers: bun run dev:redis:up && bun run dev:database:up
scripts.dev:down: bun run dev:redis:down && bun run dev:database:down
scripts.test:integration: bun run dev:containers && cd apps/api && bun test && cd ../.. && bun run db:clean
